English: Air filtration system can be enabled from a terminal in <color=orange>ZONE 23</color>
Description: A text string that appears on screen when the player attempts to open a door which is locked due to an emergency lockdown. Don't alter the RichText tags.

French.Translation: Système de filtration d'air activable depuis un terminal de la <color=orange>ZONE 23</color>.

Italian.Translation: Il sistema di filtrazione dell'aria è attivabile da un terminale nella <color=orange>ZONE 23</color>

German.Translation: Das Luftfilterungssystem kann an einem Terminal in <color=orange>ZONE 23</color> aktiviert werden.

Spanish.Translation: El sistema de filtrado de aire se puede activar desde un terminal en la <color=orange>ZONE 23</color>

Russian.Translation: Систему фильтрации воздуха можно активировать на терминале в <color=orange>ZONE 23</color>.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Possível ativar o sistema de filtragem de ar em um terminal da <color=orange>ZONE 23</color>

Polish.Translation: System filtracji powietrza można uruchomić z terminalu w <color=orange>strefie 23 [ZONE_23]</color>

Japanese.Translation: 換気システムは<color=orange>ZONE 23</color>の端末から起動可能

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 空氣過濾系統可由<color=orange>ZONE 23</color>的終端開啟

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 空气过滤系统可在<color=orange>ZONE 23</color>的终端上开启

name: LevelLayoutData.ProgressionPuzzle.CustomText_R7_C1_2
